thread.title: Ground News - Salvation Army Sees Record Demand at Food Shelves
thread.title_full: Ground News - Salvation Army Sees Record Demand at Food Shelves

author: CCX Media
title: Ground News - Salvation Army Sees Record Demand at Food Shelves
text: A familiar face to Minnesota hockey fans made his way to Maple Grove on Wednesday to help support a good cause. Minnesota Wild mascot Nordy was at the Maple Grove Cub to lend a hand with the Salvation Army’s month-long food drive. Nordy’s appearance is part of the Salvation Army’s ongoing quest to collect nonperishable food to restock the shelves of their nine metro-area food pantries.
